casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cory Dion BENNETT 406PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 23, 2019 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, for Bennett, Cory Dion. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of April 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of April 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 29th day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
